result.purpose: Responsible for providing a GraphQL client and defining request/response structures for querying staked amounts by user addresses.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to GraphQL interactions and data modeling.

internal/infras/indexer/client.go.purpose: Provides a GraphQL client for fetching staked RON amounts for user addresses.

internal/infras/indexer/models.go.purpose: Defines GraphQL request and response structures for querying staked amounts by user address.
